sentences.en: a cabinet in which she kept her collection of china ornaments
sentences.cn: 她放置瓷器摆设收藏品的柜子

sentences.en: a shelf covered with books and ornaments
sentences.cn: 摆满书籍和装饰品的架子

sentences.en: A shoulder ornament, especially a fringed strap worn on military uniforms.
sentences.cn: 肩章肩上的装饰物, 尤为军服上有流苏的肩带.

sentences.en: a silver goblet ornamented with pearls
sentences.cn: 缀有珍珠的银制高脚酒杯

sentences.en: An object, especially a vessel or an ornament, made of such glass.
sentences.cn: 水晶玻璃''.'制品'.''用这种玻璃制成的物品, 尤指器皿或''.'饰'.''物.

sentences.en: Beth ran to the window and picked her finest rose to ornament the stately bottle.
sentences.cn: 蓓丝跑到窗前摘下自己最好的玫瑰花,给那只气派十足的瓶子做装饰.

sentences.en: Education is an ornament in prosperity and a refuge in adversity.
sentences.cn: 教育是成功的装饰品和逆境的避难所.

sentences.en: He placed it as an ornament in the handle of a dragger.
sentences.cn: 他把它镶在一把匕首的柄上作为装饰.

sentences.en: He was an ornament to his country.
His person and manners must ornament his goodness with every possible charm.
sentences.cn: 他的相貌和举止也必须是最漂亮、最优雅的,必须能够为他的美德增加光彩.

sentences.en: I have always considered my face a convenience rather than an ornament.
sentences.cn: 我一直把我的面孔与其看作是装饰品,倒不如说是看作一种方便的东西.

sentences.en: She wore a cross and beads round her neck as her only ornament.
sentences.cn: 她唯一的装饰,就是她戴在脖子上的十字架和念珠.

sentences.en: Something, such as a handcuff, that resembles a wrist ornament.
sentences.cn: 类似于手腕装饰物的东西, 如手铐.

sentences.en: Studies serve for delight, for ornament, and for ability.
sentences.cn: 读书可以得到乐趣, 获得文采, 学会本领.

sentences.en: The baroque style is rich in ornament.
sentences.cn: 巴罗克风格极具装饰性.

sentences.en: The building style is plain, with very little ornament.
sentences.cn: 该建筑风格朴素，极少使用装饰。

sentences.en: The clock is simply for ornament; it doesn't work any more.
sentences.cn: 这架时钟纯属摆设，它再也不走了。

sentences.en: The flowers were put on the table for ornament.
sentences.cn: 花放在桌子上做装饰用.

sentences.en: The struggle for survival was gradually stripped of mask and ornament to reveal a primitive brutality.
sentences.cn: 生存竞争渐渐脱去文饰和面具,露出原始的狠毒.
